name: MCP
aiDescription: Model Context Protocol (MCP) is an open standard for connecting AI assistants to external data sources and tools. This add-on sets up your application as an MCP server, allowing AI assistants (like Claude, Cursor, or other MCP-compatible tools) to interact with your app's data and functionality. Key features: expose your app's data to AI assistants, define tools that AI can invoke, enable AI-powered automation of app functions. Use cases include: letting an AI assistant manage todos in your app, querying your database through natural language, or building AI-powered admin interfaces. Choose MCP when you want to make your application's functionality accessible to AI assistants. Note: MCP is an emerging standardâ€”this implementation provides a foundation that may evolve. The integration requires TanStack Start for server-side routes.
warning:
MCP is still in development and may change significantly or not be compatible with other add-ons.
The MCP implementation does not support authentication.
